name: Plant-Scout
description: PlantScout is a JavaScript based application that allows you to explore local plantlife in your region.

name: Shop-n-Chef
description: Shop-n-Chef is a disposable grocery shopping application where you can not just search for the groceries you need, but also get recipes on how to use them.

name: PWA Budget Tracker
description: Budget-Tracker allows you to add and subtract expenses and monitor your spending, from anywhere, on any device.

name: Employee Tracker
description: Keep track of the employees for your company with this CLI.

name: Note-Taker
description: Note-Taker is a simple app where you can make a list of things to do, or jot down random ideas you have throughout your day.

name: Team Profile Generator
description: TeamProfileGenerator (TPG) is CLI application where a user can generate an HTML page for a team of collaborators or members of a company.
